sustainableBusiness.heading: Making the built environment more sustainable
sustainableBusiness.subHeading: Genuit Group is making the built environment more sustainable and helping create a more resilient planet, society and business.

businessModel.heading: Business model
businessModel.subHeading: Our purpose is to address the challenges caused by climate change and urbanisation by providing water and climate management solutions. We’re helping construction build better.

businessStrategy.heading: Business Strategy
businessStrategy.subHeading: Our Sustainable Solutions for Growth strategy builds on our successful history, market positions and the deep knowledge and expertise of our people, whilst seeking to clarify how we will outperform the wider market and unlock value from within the Group.

quote.statement: With our presence in both water and air based climate management technology, Genuit is uniquely placed to offer the solutions for the future of low carbon heating and cooling
quote.author: Matthew Webber, MD, Climate Management Solutions

quote.statement: The impact of climate change on the need to accommodate extreme weather events is clear. We are committed to designing solutions which address that need, and in doing so also provide for higher quality urban spaces. Our significant usage of recyclate also means that we are minimising our own impact upon the climate
quote.author: Steve Durdant-Hollamby, MD, Water Management Solutions

quote.statement: With our leading brand positions, we are well placed to help our customers reduce their carbon impact. We are committed to an innovation programme which will build on the progress we have already made
quote.author: Steve Currier, MD, Sustainable Building Solutions

statements.heading: Creating a better built environment
statements.quote: Sustainability continues to be at the heart of our growth agenda
statements.author: Kevin Boyd, Independent Non-Executive Chair

statements.heading: Our Results: Progress in the face of challenge
statements.quote: Robust financial performance achieved in a year of considerable macro economic and political uncertainty with continued levels of high inflation and constraints in supply chain
statements.author: Joe Vorih, Chief Executive Officer

statements.heading: A strong performance despite uncertainty
statements.quote: The Group continues to experience a strong performance despite macroeconomic and political uncertainty, ongoing high inflation and supply constraints
statements.author: Paul James, Chief Financial Officer
